interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
Review Date: 2020/07/29
Store: AIFAIFA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
Review Text: I like that it comes in a case. The colors are vibrant. No strong smell. Only thing that disappointed me was the light. I had to do one finger at a time, flip it twice under it's own time in order to get fully dry. The light did not extend to all my fingers without some odd maneuvering.
Review Title: Nice except the light.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara
SIKEMAY
{'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
I really wanted to like this. Unlike most fiber mascaras this didnt give me much volume or length. And it flaked off after a full day of wear. I really love the packaging. I think this may be ok on fake lashes but not so great on real or short lashes.
Not a true fiber mascara.
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that it comes in a case. The colors are vibrant. No strong smell. Only thing that disappointed me was the light. I had to do one finger at a time, flip it twice under it's own time in order to get fully dry. The light did not extend to all my fingers without some odd maneuvering.
Nice except the light.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has a strong interest in cosmetics, particularly in mascara, and has recently expanded their interests to include nail products, indicating a broader interest in beauty enhancements. They particularly favor features like volume, length, and durability in mascara, while seeking vibrant colors and practical packaging in nail products.

- **Quality Expectations:** This individual maintains high standards for performance across all beauty products, emphasizing effective results. They are particularly drawn to items that deliver on their promises, and express disappointment when products do not meet expectations. 

- **Packaging Appreciation:** The user appreciates attractive and practical packaging, suggesting that aesthetics influence their purchasing decisions. 

- **User Experience with Fiber Mascaras:** They possess prior experience with fiber mascaras, showing a critical perspective on their performance concerning volume and longevity, indicating a preference for effective formulations. 

- **Nail Product Insights:** In their recent nail product interaction, they highlighted the vibrant colors and packaging benefits but expressed dissatisfaction with the functionality of the drying light, showing their trend toward providing constructive feedback based on personal experience.

Overall, this user prioritizes effective and reliable cosmetics, spanning both makeup and nail products, values quality and aesthetics, and is inclined to share detailed feedback based on their experiences.
